channel.title: Api Gateways on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Api Gateways on Konigi

item.title: Evernote – Authorize Slack Access
item.description: This is the authorization gateway screen shown by Evernote to give Slack access to Evernote services. A dropdown list allows the user to set options for the life of the session and provides brief instruction for how to revoke access at any time in the user’s Settings.
